member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Util.ThumbnailExtractor.ExtractAsync(System.String,Tizen.Multimedia.Size)
member.summary: Extracts the thumbnail for the given media with the specified path and size.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous extracting operation.
member.remarks:
If the width is not a multiple of 8, it can be changed by the inner process.
The width will be a multiple of 8 greater than the set value.

member.summary: Extracts the thumbnail for the given media with the specified path and size.

member.remarks:
If the width is not a multiple of 8, it can be changed by the inner process.
The width will be a multiple of 8 greater than the set value.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Util.ThumbnailExtractor.Extract(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the thumbnail for the given media with the specified path and size. The generated thumbnail will be returned in .
member.remarks:
The size of generated thumbnail will be 320x240.
If the size of has different ratio from 320x240 (approximately 1.33:1),
thumbnail is generated in a way to keep the ratio of , which is based on short axis of .
For example, if the size of is 900x500 (1.8:1), the size of generated thumbnail is 432x240(1.8:1).
To set the size different from 320x240, please use .
If you want to access internal storage, you should add privilege http://tizen.org/privilege/mediastorage.
If you want to access external storage, you should add privilege http://tizen.org/privilege/externalstorage.
member.param: The path of the media file to extract the thumbnail.
member.exception: The specified file is not supported.
The caller has no required privilege.

member.name: M:Tizen.Multimedia.Util.ThumbnailExtractor.Extract(System.String,Tizen.Multimedia.Size)

member.remarks:
The size of generated thumbnail will be .
But, if the size of has different ratio with ,
thumbnail will be generated in a way to keep the ratio of , which based on short axis of .
For example, if the size of is 900x500 (1.8:1)) and is 320x240,
the size of generated thumbnail is 432x240(1.8:1).
If you want to access internal storage, you should add privilege http://tizen.org/privilege/mediastorage.
If you want to access external storage, you should add privilege http://tizen.org/privilege/externalstorage.
